text: Madren Elbern "John" Calvert (August 5, 1911 - September 27, 2013) was an American magician. He performed on stage (including Broadway) for eight decades both in the United States and worldwide. Calvert married his wife Tammy in 1982. He died on September 27, 2013, aged 102. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American magicians Category:American centenarians Category:Entertainers from Indiana
title: John Calvert (magician)
